About me

A long time ago in a galaxy far, far away...
In the time, when I wrote my first line of HTML, web development is become my passion and power. Since that time I've been started to learn how to control and use my power in the right way. And now my major dream is to achieve the heights of excellence in Web-development side.

Let me introduce myself

Hi there! My name is Inna and I'm Front-end developer from Ukraine.
Also I'm a trainer at CyberBionic Systematics - Front-end branch (HTML/CSS, JavaScript Essential, JavaScript Advance).

Resume

Professional experience

2017 - till now
GlobalLogic - Front-end developer
Implementation of new product features, with focus on Web-UI Development (JavaScript / ReactJS) within Application Integration solutions.
2015
Web developer - Freelancer
Preparing markup and styles from sketches and integration with the CMS Wordpress
2011 - 2013
VISICOM GIS Engineer
Processing and vectorization of raster. Editing and maintenance of digital maps and databases. Updating digital maps using space images for GPS-navigators and on-line services.
2006 - 2011
Student
College of Information Technology and Land Management at the National Aviation University - Qualifications Bachelor in "Mapping, geodesy and land management" kitz.nau.edu.ua
2015 - 2017
Unicorn Systems - Front-end developer
Write quality code (mostly HTML, CSS, and JS) which is linked to the backend web content management system. Front-end architecture design and development of the applications. Create user-centred designs based on business and functional requirements, user research, market analysis, customer feedback, and usability findings.
2013 - 2015
VISICOM GIS Project Manager
Preparation and analysis of raster and vector data, taking into account the client's wishes and specification of the project. Checking components and database (spatial and semantic information). visicom.ua
2009 - 2011
SSPE "Kartographia" - Cartographer
Decoding satellite imagery, creating maps scale of 1: 2000 - 1: 10000. Editing and maintenance of digital maps and databases. ukrmap.com.ua
